data.text:
@TonyVee25982797 #TruckersConvoy2022 

Please deliver Tony a set of ballz.

GOOOO TRUCKERS!!! 🚛🚚🛻🚛🚚🛻🇺🇸
putting their lives on hold to stand UP for freedom
Honk HONKKKKK!!! 🚛🇺🇸

@TonyVee25982797 Grow some ballz Tony.
You sit behind your computer while truckers delivered everything to you during Covid.
Now truckers, nurses & cops are getting fired because they didn't want poisonous vaccine.
They didn't fall for it like you did Tony.
Stop being a wimp.

@TonyVee25982797 I was looking at a career change a few years ago and thought it might be cool to drive a truck, so I got CDL's. But after the course I guess I decided that I just couldn't deal with that Alpha Male bigotry.
@TonyVee25982797 Midterms are going to be rough for democrats.  What other group are you guys alienating before November?  #TruckersConvoy2022
